lyrics.japanese: 思い出すのは君の歌
lyrics.romaji: omoidasu no wa kimi no uta
lyrics.english: What I remember is your song

lyrics.japanese: 会話よりも鮮明だ
lyrics.romaji: kaiwa yori mo senmei da
lyrics.english: More vivid than our conversations

lyrics.japanese: どこに行ってしまったの
lyrics.romaji: doko ni itte shimatta no
lyrics.english: Where did you go?

lyrics.japanese: いつも探すんだよ
lyrics.romaji: itsumo sagasu n da yo
lyrics.english: I'm always searching for you

lyrics.japanese: 思い出すのは君の歌
lyrics.romaji: omoidasu no wa kimi no uta
lyrics.english: What I remember is your song

lyrics.japanese: 歌い笑う顔が鮮明だ
lyrics.romaji: utai warau kao ga senmei da
lyrics.english: Your singing, laughing face is so clear

lyrics.japanese: 君に似合うんだよ
lyrics.romaji: kimi ni niau n da yo
lyrics.english: It suits you so well

lyrics.japanese: ずっと見ていたいよ
lyrics.romaji: zutto mite itai yo
lyrics.english: I want to keep watching forever

lyrics.japanese: でも最後に見たいのは
lyrics.romaji: demo saigo ni mitai no wa
lyrics.english: But what I want to see at the end

lyrics.japanese: きっともう君の夢の中
lyrics.romaji: kitto mou kimi no yume no naka
lyrics.english: Must be inside your dreams

lyrics.japanese: もう一度 また聞かせてくれよ
lyrics.romaji: mou ichido mata kikasete kure yo
lyrics.english: Let me hear it once more

lyrics.japanese: 聞きたいんだ
lyrics.romaji: kikitain da
lyrics.english: I want to hear it

lyrics.japanese: もっと騒げ怪獣の歌
lyrics.romaji: motto sawage kaijuu no uta
lyrics.english: Make more noise, monster's song

lyrics.japanese: まだ消えない 夢の歌唄えて
lyrics.romaji: mada kienai yume no uta utaete
lyrics.english: Still not gone, sing the dream song

lyrics.japanese: 君がいつも歌う怪獣の歌
lyrics.romaji: kimi ga itsumo utau kaijuu no uta
lyrics.english: The monster's song you always sing

lyrics.japanese: まだ消えない 口ずさんでしまうよ
lyrics.romaji: mada kienai kuchi zusande shimau yo
lyrics.english: Still not gone, I find myself humming it

lyrics.japanese: 思い出すのは 君がいた
lyrics.romaji: omoidasu no wa kimi ga ita
lyrics.english: What I remember is you being there

lyrics.japanese: ギター持ってる 君がいた
lyrics.romaji: gitaa motteru kimi ga ita
lyrics.english: You were there, holding a guitar

lyrics.japanese: 忘れられないんだよ
lyrics.romaji: wasurerarenain da yo
lyrics.english: I can't forget

lyrics.japanese: だから僕が歌うよ
lyrics.romaji: dakara boku ga utau yo
lyrics.english: So I'll sing

lyrics.japanese: でも最後に見たいのは
lyrics.romaji: demo saigo ni mitai no wa
lyrics.english: But what I want to see at the end

lyrics.japanese: きっともう君の夢の中
lyrics.romaji: kitto mou kimi no yume no naka
lyrics.english: Must be inside your dreams

lyrics.japanese: もう一度 また聞かせてくれよ
lyrics.romaji: mou ichido mata kikasete kure yo
lyrics.english: Let me hear it once more

lyrics.japanese: 聞きたいんだ
lyrics.romaji: kikitain da
lyrics.english: I want to hear it

lyrics.japanese: もっと騒げ怪獣の歌
lyrics.romaji: motto sawage kaijuu no uta
lyrics.english: Make more noise, monster's song

lyrics.japanese: まだ消えない 夢の歌唄えて
lyrics.romaji: mada kienai yume no uta utaete
lyrics.english: Still not gone, sing the dream song

lyrics.japanese: 君がいつも歌う怪獣の歌
lyrics.romaji: kimi ga itsumo utau kaijuu no uta
lyrics.english: The monster's song you always sing

lyrics.japanese: まだ消えない 口ずさんでしまうよ
lyrics.romaji: mada kienai kuchi zusande shimau yo
lyrics.english: Still not gone, I find myself humming it

lyrics.japanese: 落ちてく過去は鮮明で
lyrics.romaji: ochiteku kako wa senmei de
lyrics.english: The falling past is vivid

lyrics.japanese: 見せたい未来は繊細で
lyrics.romaji: misetai mirai wa sensai de
lyrics.english: The future I want to show is delicate

lyrics.japanese: すぎてく日々には鈍感な君へ
lyrics.romaji: sugiteku hibi ni wa donkan na kimi e
lyrics.english: To you who are insensitive to passing days

lyrics.japanese: 落ちてく過去は鮮明で
lyrics.romaji: ochiteku kako wa senmei de
lyrics.english: The falling past is vivid

lyrics.japanese: 見せたい未来は繊細で
lyrics.romaji: misetai mirai wa sensai de
lyrics.english: The future I want to show is delicate

lyrics.japanese: すぎてく日々には鈍感な君へ
lyrics.romaji: sugiteku hibi ni wa donkan na kimi e
lyrics.english: To you who are insensitive to passing days

lyrics.japanese: ねぇ もっと騒げ怪獣の歌
lyrics.romaji: nee motto sawage kaijuu no uta
lyrics.english: Hey, make more noise, monster's song

lyrics.japanese: まだ消えない 夢の歌唄えて
lyrics.romaji: mada kienai yume no uta utaete
lyrics.english: Still not gone, sing the dream song

lyrics.japanese: 君がいつも歌う怪獣の歌
lyrics.romaji: kimi ga itsumo utau kaijuu no uta
lyrics.english: The monster's song you always sing

lyrics.japanese: まだ消えない 口ずさんでしまうよ whoa
lyrics.romaji: mada kienai kuchi zusande shimau yo whoa
lyrics.english: Still not gone, I find myself humming it, whoa

lyrics.japanese: ねぇ 僕ら 眠れない夜に手を伸ばして
lyrics.romaji: nee bokura nemurenai yoru ni te wo nobashite
lyrics.english: Hey, we reach out our hands on sleepless nights

lyrics.japanese: 眠らない夜をまた伸ばして
lyrics.romaji: nemuranai yoru wo mata nobashite
lyrics.english: Stretching out the sleepless night again

lyrics.japanese: 眠くないまだね
lyrics.romaji: nemukunai mada ne
lyrics.english: Still not sleepy yet

lyrics.japanese: そんな日々でいたいのにな
lyrics.romaji: sonna hibi de itai no ni na
lyrics.english: I wish I could stay in those days

lyrics.japanese: 懲りずに 眠れない夜に手を伸ばして
lyrics.romaji: korizuni nemurenai yoru ni te wo nobashite
lyrics.english: Without learning, reaching out on sleepless nights

lyrics.japanese: 眠らない夜をまた伸ばして
lyrics.romaji: nemuranai yoru wo mata nobashite
lyrics.english: Stretching out the sleepless night again

lyrics.japanese: 眠くないまだね
lyrics.romaji: nemukunai mada ne
lyrics.english: Still not sleepy yet

lyrics.japanese: そんな夜に歌う 怪獣の歌
lyrics.romaji: sonna yoru ni utau kaijuu no uta
lyrics.english: The monster's song sung on such nights

lyrics.japanese: 落ちてく過去は鮮明で
lyrics.romaji: ochiteku kako wa senmei de
lyrics.english: The falling past is vivid

lyrics.japanese: 見せたい未来は繊細で
lyrics.romaji: misetai mirai wa sensai de
lyrics.english: The future I want to show is delicate

lyrics.japanese: すぎてく日々には鈍感な君へ
lyrics.romaji: sugiteku hibi ni wa donkan na kimi e
lyrics.english: To you who are insensitive to passing days

lyrics.romaji: ochiteku kako wa senmei de
lyrics.english: The falling past is vivid

lyrics.japanese: 見せたい未来は繊細で
lyrics.romaji: misetai mirai wa sensai de
lyrics.english: The future I want to show is delicate

lyrics.romaji: sugiteku hibi ni wa donkan na kimi e
